judgment_text:
:1:
 IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 COMPANY APPLICATION NO. OF 2005
 IN
 COMPANY PETITION NO.806 OF 1988
 In the matter of Companies Act
 I of 1956;
 And
 In the matter of M/s.Trimurti
 Housing Development Co. Ltd.
 (In Liqun.)
 Mahadeo Parashuram Ganpula ..Applicant.
 Vs.
 Official Liquidator being
 Liquidator of M/s.Trimurti
 Development Co. Ltd. (In Liqn.) ..Respondent.
 Mr.S.A.Tawade for the Applicant.
 Ms.K.V.Gautam, Dy. Official Liquidator present.
 CORAM : S.J. VAZIFDAR, J.
 CORAM : S.J. VAZIFDAR, J.
 CORAM : S.J. VAZIFDAR, J.
 DATED : 27TH JANUARY, 2006
 DATED : 27TH JANUARY, 2006
 DATED : 27TH JANUARY, 2006
 P.C. :
 P.C. :
 P.C. :
 The only dispute is the security charges payable
 by the Applicant. According to the Official
 Liquidator, on an apportionment, the Applicant is
 liable to pay Rs.1,00,321/- as their proportionate
 share of security charges. This is disputed by the
 Applicant.
 :2:
 2. Other than the above dispute, there is no
 impediment to the Official Liquidator in handing
 over possession in accordance with the order of the
 Division Bench dated 25th July, 2005.
 3. In the circumstances, the following order is
 passed :
 i) The Official Liquidator shall hand over
 possession of the property in accordance with
 the order dated 25.7.2005 within two weeks of
 the Applicant depositing with the Official
 Liquidator, a sum of Rs.1,00,321/-.
 ii) The deposit by the Applicant as aforesaid, if
 made, shall abide by the final result in the
 above Company Application.
 Company Application is made returnable after six
 weeks.
